Package ca.phon.phonex

Class SyllableBoundaryTransition

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.phon.fsa.FSATransition<IPAElement>
      • ca.phon.phonex.PhonexTransition
        • ca.phon.phonex.SyllableBoundaryTransition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    public class SyllableBoundaryTransition
extends PhonexTransition
    Used to detect syllable boundaries. Syllable boundaries can be 'hard' (i.e., a '.' or other punctuation) or 'soft' as detected between a (coda, onset) pair.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  SyllableBoundaryTransition.PunctuationTest
      Class for testing if a phone is punctuation.
